text: Pedro General Taduran Jr. (born 29 October 1996) is a Filipino professional boxer who has held the IBF mini-flyweight title since 2019. ==Professional career== Pedro Taduran turned professional in 2015 and compiled a record of 13-2 before facing and defeating fellow Filipino Boxer Samuel Salva, to win the vacant IBF mini-flyweight title. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable"
